## Container.preloadMetadata() method

Preload metadata for components of a specific type Useful before batch registration of a particular component type

**Signature:**

```typescript
preloadMetadata(type?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | _(Optional)_ Component type to preload metadata for (optional, if not provided preloads all) |

**Returns:**

void

## Example

// Before registering all controllers: IOC.preloadMetadata('CONTROLLER'); const controllers = IOC.listClass('CONTROLLER'); controllers.forEach((<!-- -->{<!-- -->target, id<!-- -->}<!-- -->) =<!-- -->&gt; IOC.reg(target));
